clip.quote: I don't take that for granted... for someone to choose you, it is an honor.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the gratitude and dedication required in real estate.
clip.suggested_hook: Why every client is an honor to serve in real estate.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why is every client in real estate an honor to serve?",
    "SETUP": "Meet Kristee Leonard, a top real estate agent who believes gratitude and dedication are key. But why should you care?",
    "INSIGHT": "Kristee shares, 'I don't take that for granted... for someone to choose you, it is an honor.' This mindset fuels her success and client relationships.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Recognize each client as an honor. This perspective can transform your approach and elevate your real estate business.",
    "CTA": "Reflect on your client relationships. How can you show more gratitude today? Share your thoughts in the comments!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Every client is an honor. Discover how gratitude can transform your real estate business.",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateGratitude", "#ClientHonor", "#RealEstateSuccess", "#WorkEthic", "#RealEstateTips"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```

clip.quote: If you choose to take on that client, then you need to represent them just like if they were a multimillion dollar deal.
clip.why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the importance of consistent service quality.
clip.suggested_hook: The secret to maintaining a luxury brand in real estate.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to know the secret to maintaining a luxury brand in real estate?",
    "SETUP": "Kristee Leonard shares why every client deserves the same top-tier service, regardless of deal size.",
    "INSIGHT": "She emphasizes, 'If you choose to take on that client, then you need to represent them just like if they were a multimillion dollar deal.' This mindset ensures consistent service quality.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "By treating every client like a luxury client, you build a reputation that attracts more high-value opportunities.",
    "CTA": "Think about your current clients. Are you giving them the luxury treatment? Share your thoughts below!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Treat every client like a luxury client. Your reputation will thank you! ðŸ’¼âœ¨",
```
